title: GODM Decision Weights Schema V2
description: Defines the required structure for the HybridWeighted decision matrix and validation schema for dynamically loaded policies.

WeightingFactors.description: List of core factors influencing decisions.

ContextualAdjustments.description: Dynamic weight multipliers based on operational context.

^[A-Z_]+$.description: Multiplier for a specific context (e.g., LOW_RESOURCE_MODE).

DefaultAction.description: Action taken if no policy matches (e.g., 'Queue_For_Manual_Review').
